Powerful Features

Built for modern teams

Everything you need to manage your visitors efficiently, packaged in a beautiful interface.

Smart Dashboard

Real-time analytics and visitor tracking at a glance. Get insights instantly.

Enhanced Security

Secure check-ins via QR codes and instant notifications for unauthorized access attempts.

Time Tracking

Automated entry and exit logging. Perfect for auditing and attendance records.

Role Management

Granular permissions for Admins, Receptionists, and Students.

Data Analytics

Visual charts and downloadable reports to understand visitor traffic patterns.

Instant Alerts

Notifications via Email and Dashboard when visitors arrive or depart.
